__e: Dans ce tumulte, la foi chrétienne se propageait par les églises et les monastères.
In this darkness the Christian faith was spread through churches and monasteries.
Dans ce tumulte, la foi chrétienne se propageait par les églises et les monastères.
In this darkness the Christian faith was spread through churches and monasteries.
Les moines ont lancé un mouvement de protestation et les monastères sont pris d'assaut par l'armée.
The monks launched a protest movement and monasteries were stormed by the army.

I've spent my entire life in and around dojos and monasteries, training with masters of all kinds... listening to their stories and legends about Immortal Weapons.

The monks launched a protest movement and monasteries were stormed by the army.
